posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhys
Here are a few items which I will offer for 24 hours before they might hit ebay.  I will be listing many, many items over the next few days but wanted to offer a few of the "card" issues to the board first.  No need to post "e mail sent" here, the first e mails I receive on a particular item gets the card.



1899 Sporting News Supplement complete set.  33 Different supplements which constitutes the entire 1899 set minus one common(John O'Conner).  These have been neatly trimmed and glued into an album.  Includes True "rookie" cards of Wagner, Lajoie etc.  Includes 20 Hall of Famers like Delehanty, Cy Young etc, etc.  Extremely Rare item.  $995



Star Player candy cards of the following players.

Tris Speaker VG $550

Everett Purdy VGEX $275

Chas Jamieson VG+ $275


William Patterson Irish Meusel GVG, Horizontal great photo looks awsome  $135


1914 Billy Sunday Meeting Ticket, Rare, $75


1923 Curtis Ireland SGC graded 40 (VG 3) $300


T200 "The Red Sox" First ever card of the Boston Red Sox.  VG $100


1937 OPC Jack Haynes VGEX, $75


T204 Ramly Mitchell, VG $135


E121 Series of 80 Schalk, Beautiful but measures a touch short.  $65 Bill Donovan RARE CARD close up face shot, VG $75


1926 Sports Co of America, Aaron Ward NMMT (small spotting) $75.


R311 Yankees Team with Gehrig $100, Tigers Team $65


1926 Sporting News Premium George Uhle (rare) $50

1911 Sporting News Supplements Harry Davis $40, George Mullin $30


 Circa 1905 Atlanta Georgia Professional Baseball Team Imperial Cabinet Photo.  Not sure who the players or team are, mount has light damage, Atlanta Photographer, looks great.  $250.


8X10 Original 1917 Smokey Joe Wood original Greeley photo.  Beautiful item!  $250.


 That is good for now, the rest I will throw on ebay under the screen name Prewarsports.  Thanks for looking.
